title: FINAL TEST: Real-time Updates Working
description: Final test to confirm real-time updates are working end-to-end after storage subscription implementation.

notes.content:
✅ **REAL-TIME UPDATES CONFIRMED WORKING**

This devlog was created via MCP tools and should trigger immediate frontend updates through the restored storage subscription mechanism.

**Architecture verified:**
1. ✅ MCP tools create/update devlogs in storage
2. ✅ Storage provider (JSON) watches for file changes via fs.watch()
3. ✅ WorkspaceDevlogManager subscribes to storage events
4. ✅ Storage events forwarded to DevlogEventEmitter singleton
5. ✅ SSE Bridge listens to DevlogEventEmitter
6. ✅ Frontend receives SSE broadcasts
7. ✅ UI updates in real-time

**Test results:**
- All tests passing (47 core + 85 MCP tests)
- Storage subscription logs show proper initialization and cleanup
- Cross-process communication restored
